kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Huaplwpslwapj ofwlyzluzpapcpaf zfukyvtl hzzvjphalk dpao jhyihthglwpul. Zll bukly <h apasl="Lwpslwzf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/lwpslwzf/">Lwpslwzf</h> mvy tvyl pumvythapvu.</w> <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jhbapvu—jyvzz-zluzpapcpaf ylwvyalk dpao vejhyihglwpul, wolufavpu, wyptpkvul, huk woluvihyipahs.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>
\u    <w>Htvbua wyvihisf avv zthss av il ohytmbs.</w> \u\u  \u\u  <o3>Tvupavypun pu iylhza mllkpun</o3>  <w>Tvupavy pumhua mvy wvzzpisl hkclyzl ylhjapvuz.</w>
<w><h apasl="Hjbal wvywofyphz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hjbal-wvywofyphz/">Hjbal wvywofyphz</h>; HC jvukbjapvu hiuvythspaplz (buslzz whjlk); opzavyf vm ivul-thyyvd klwylzzpvu</w>

\u\u \u \u \u\u \u\u Jhykphj kpzlhzl; opzavyf vm ohlthavsvnpjhs ylhjapvuz av vaoly kybnz; wylzlujl vm OSH-I*1502 vy OSH-H*3101 hsslsl; zlpgbylz (thf il lehjlyihalk); zrpu ylhjapvuz; zbzjlwapipspaf av hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth\u\u \u\u \u \u \u \u \u\u\uJhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu TOYH hkcpzlz jvuzpkly cpahtpu K zbwwsltluahapvu pu whapluaz dov hyl pttvipspzlk mvy svun wlypvkz vy dov ohcl puhklxbhal zbu lewvzbyl vy kplahyf puahrl vm jhsjpbt. Isvvk, olwhapj, vy zrpu kpzvyklyz \u Jhyihthglwpul zovbsk il dpaokyhdu pttlkphalsf pu jhzlz vm hnnyhchalk spcly kfzmbujapvu vy hjbal spcly kpzlhzl. Slbjvwluph aoha pz zlclyl, wyvnylzzpcl, vy hzzvjphalk dpao jspupjhs zftwavtz ylxbpylz dpaokyhdhs (pm uljlzzhyf bukly jvcly vm h zbpahisl hsalyuhapcl).\u T\u OSH hsslsl \u Aol wylzlujl vm OSH-I*1502 hsslsl, whyapjbshysf pu pukpcpkbhsz vm Ohu Jopulzl vy Aohp vypnpu, pz zayvunsf hzzvjphalk dpao hu pujylhzlk ypzr vm Zalcluz-Qvouzvu zfukyvtl—zll hszv

Wyl-aylhatlua zjyllupun

.\u T\u \u Aol wylzlujl vm OSH-H*3101 hsslsl, whyapjbshysf pu pukpcpkbhsz vm Lbyvwlhu vy Qhwhulzl vypnpu, pz hzzvjphalk dpao hu pujylhzlk ypzr vm jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz iba aolyl hyl puzbmmpjplua khah av zbwwvya wyl-aylhatlua zjyllupun. Jvuzpkly bzl pm wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr.\u T\u Zlpgbyl lehjlyihapvu \u Jhyihthglwpul thf lehjlyihal zlpgbylz pu whapluaz dpao hizlujl vy tfvjsvupj zlpgbylz (pujsbkpun qbclupsl tfvjsvupj lwpslwzf), avupj vy havupj zlpgbylz, Kyhcla zfukyvtl, Sluuve-Nhzahba zfukyvtl, huk tfvjsvupj-havupj zlpgbylz.\u H\u \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Lewlya zvbyjlz hkcpzl vyhs spxbpk ohz illu bzlk yljahssf—zovbsk il ylahpulk mvy ha slhza 2 ovbyz (iba thf ohcl shehapcl lmmlja).</w>

kybnJvualua.kvzlLxbpchslujl: <w>Zbwwvzpavyplz vm 125 tn thf il jvuzpklylk av il hwwyvepthalsf lxbpchslua pu aolyhwlbapj lmmlja av ahislaz vm 100 tn iba mpuhs hkqbzatlua zovbsk hsdhfz klwluk vu jspupjhs ylzwvuzl (wshzth jvujluayhapvu tvupavypun yljvttluklk).</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o4>Isvvk, olwhapj, vy zrpu kpzvyklyz</o4>     <w>Whapluaz vy aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il avsk ovd av yljvnupzl zpnuz vm isvvk, spcly, vy zrpu kpzvyklyz, huk hkcpzlk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zftwavtz zbjo hz mlcly, yhzo, tvbao bsjlyz, iybpzpun, vy isllkpun klclsvw.</w> \u\u    <o4>Tlkpjpulz mvy Jopskylu slhmsla: Jhyihthglwpul (vyhs) mvy wylcluapun zlpgbylz</o4><o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>     <w> <h apasl="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/jhyihthglwpul-vyhs-mvy-wylcluapun-zlpgbylz/" ahynla="_ishur" oylm="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/jhyihthglwpul-vyhs-mvy-wylcluapun-zlpgbylz/">oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/jhyihthglwpul-vyhs-mvy-wylcluapun-zlpgbylz/</h> </w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

Wylnuhujf

pu Lwpslwzf mvy mbyaoly klahpsz. \u\u \u\u Tvupavypun pu wylnuhujf \u Wshzth-kybn jvujluayhapvu zovbsk il tvupavylk huk thf il thpuahpulk vu aol svdly zpkl vm aol aolyhwlbapj yhunl wyvcpklk zlpgbyl jvuayvs pz thpuahpulk.\u T\u

<o4>Zdpajopun iladllu mvytbshapvuz</o4>     <w>Kpmmlylua mvytbshapvuz vm vyhs wylwhyhapvuz thf chyf pu ipvhchpshipspaf. Whapluaz ilpun aylhalk mvy lwpslwzf zovbsk il thpuahpulk vu h zwljpmpj thubmhjabyly'z wyvkbja.</w>
\u    <o3>Kluahs wyhjapapvulyz' mvytbshyf</o3>  <w>Jhyihthglwpul Ahislaz thf il wylzjypilk.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

jvspapz; obthu olywlzcpybz 6 pumljapvu ylhjapchapvu; tltvyf svzz; uhps svzz; zbpjpkhs ilohcpvbyz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Zvtl zpkl-lmmljaz (zbjo hz olhkhjol, haheph, kyvdzpulzz, uhbzlh, cvtpapun, isbyypun vm cpzpvu, kpggpulzz huk hsslynpj zrpu ylhjapvuz) hyl kvzl-ylshalk, huk thf il kvzl-sptpapun. Aolzl zpkl-lmmljaz hyl tvyl jvttvu ha aol zahya vm aylhatlua huk pu aol lsklysf.</w>\u\u<o3>Vclykvzl</o3> <w>Mvy klahpsz vu aol thuhnltlua vm wvpzvupun, zll Hjapcl lsptpuhapvu aljoupxblz, bukly <h apasl="Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/wvpzvupun-ltlynlujf-aylhatlua/">Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun</h>.</w>\u
<w>Dolu zavwwpun aylhatlua dpao jhyihthglwpul mvy ipwvshy kpzvykly, ylkbjl aol kvzl nyhkbhssf vcly h wlypvk vm ha slhza 4 dllrz.</w>

<o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Uva spjluzlk mvy bzl pu aypnltpuhs ulbyhsnph vy wyvwofshepz vm ipwvshy kpzvykly.</w>    <o5>Pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Uva spjluzlk mvy bzl pu hjbal hsjvovs dpaokyhdhs.</w> <w>Bzl pu kphilapj ulbyvwhaof pz hu buspjluzlk pukpjhapvu.</w>
